title: A subpæna from the high imperiall court of heauen to bee serued vpon all men: vpon an information preferred by iustice against man-kinde. With the answer, and reply from Mercie, and her directions how to come to heauen, if we auoyd sinne. Shrinke not from this subpæna, which is pend; esteeme it well, for sure thou must appeare ... oh sinner, learne to seeke for thy saluation, if thou in heauen wouldst haue eternall ioyes.
author: Andrewes, John, fl. 1615.
